text: All in the title. It should stop the download and erase the temporary directory.
title: Ctrl + C doesn't work during dataset downloading
Ctrl + C doesn't work during dataset downloading

text: Cannot reproduce. It seemed to be the case on Baptiste's computer but on mine Ctrl + C works as expected.

Probably the SIGINT is hijacked by something system-specific
